definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Carla then expanded her scope to include speed swimming and synchronized swimming.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉然後她的範圍擴大到包括高速游泳和花樣游泳。

sentences.english: Daddy has told me that water ballet is also called Synchronized Swimming.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸告訴我水上芭蕾又叫花樣游泳。

sentences.english: The technical routines of synchronized swimmer are accompanied with music.
sentences.chinese: 花樣游泳的自選動作有音樂伴奏。

sentences.english: Kristina is an Olympic synchronized swimmer.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯蒂娜是奧林匹克花樣游泳選手。

sentences.english: I think synchronised swimming is very special.
sentences.chinese: 我想花樣游泳比賽很特別。
